info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 26 at 10:07AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank.
* WHEN...From this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 1054.0 feet, The low water crossing on 479th Avenue begins to flood. At 1056.0 feet, Significant agricultural flooding begins.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 1056.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Thursday was 1056.1 feet. - Flood stage is 1056.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Friday evening at 615 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
